# depthResolveFilter

**Instance Property**

The filter used for an MSAA depth resolve operation.

## Declaration

```swift
var depthResolveFilter: MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter/sample0].
